name: Dragonroot
description: A rare root that grants immense strength when consumed.

name: Sageleaf
description: A leaf that sharpens the mind and boosts intelligence.

name: Golden Ginseng
description: A golden root that enhances physical vitality.

name: Moonshade Petal
description: A petal that enhances charisma under the light of the moon.

name: Elven Vine
description: A magical vine that grants increased agility.

name: Astral Herb
description: A mystical herb that enhances intelligence during spells.

name: Dwarven Pepper
description: A spicy pepper that boosts constitution and endurance.

name: Silverthorn
description: A thorn that grants greater strength to those who wield it.

name: Frostmoss
description: A cold moss that increases agility and dexterity.

name: Starfall Blossom
description: A rare blossom that boosts intelligence when night falls.

name: Titan Vine
description: A sturdy vine that grants the strength of a titan.

name: Willow Spark
description: A crackling herb that boosts constitution.

name: Radiant Petal
description: A petal that enhances charisma with its ethereal glow.

name: Thunderleaf
description: A leaf that enhances strength with each thunderstorm.

name: Celestial Orchid
description: An orchid that grants enhanced charisma during rituals.

name: Amber Bloom
description: A glowing bloom that enhances dexterity.

name: Firepetal
description: A fiery petal that enhances strength when consumed.

name: Mosscap
description: A mushroom that enhances constitution when brewed into tea.

name: Dreamer's Dew
description: A dewdrop that enhances charisma and inspires dreams.

name: Lion's Mane Fern
description: A fern that grants greater agility and dexterity.
